result.arabic_text: ٱلَّذِينَ يُبَلِّغُونَ رِسَٰلَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَيَخۡشَوۡنَهُۥ وَلَا يَخۡشَوۡنَ أَحَدًا إِلَّا ٱللَّهَۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ حَسِيبٗا
result.translation: Nya Bavugishwamana bashikiriza abantu ubutumwa bw’Imana Allah, bagaheza bagatinya Imana Allah Yo Yonyene ata guhirahira ngo batinye ikindi kintu na kimwe. Burya Imana Allah, Irakwiye kuba ari Yo Mureretsi Iharurira Igahembera ibiremwa ivyo vyakoze.
